mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into article (title, content, user_id, create_time) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, title, content, user_id, create_time from article
